summary: Study Calculator app — a calculator with study-focused features. User requested a hamburger menu (☰) button on the right-hand side.

existing_features.title: Add a hamburger menu (☰) icon button on the right-hand side of the app header in App.tsx. The button should be visually styled to match the existing dark theme (neon-green accent, dark background). Clicking the button should toggle a slide-in or dropdown side menu panel. The menu panel can initially be empty or contain placeholder navigation items (e.g., 'Calculator', 'History') as a foundation for future expansion.
